title: StickyBoard
description: A web-based virtual sticky board that lets users create, move, link and organize digital notes.

title: Mealink
description: Mealink is a web platform that connects donors and recipients, allowing people to donate and receive unused food, clothes, and household items with ease.

title: Hydralic SpeedBreaker - IIC Regional Level Project
description: Built an AI-driven smart speed breaker that uses trained vision models and sensor fusion to identify approaching ambulances and automatically lower the hydraulic system, improving response time and enhancing patient safety.

title: Proxi-Brake
description: An IoT-based automatic braking system that uses ultrasonic sensors to detect rear obstacles and apply emergency brakes for accident prevention.
